snippet: Tyler Walker of Aspen, Colo., tumbled several times and lay motionless before members of the medical staff rushed to his side.
abstract: American Paralympic skier Tyler Walker is in stable condition at hospital after crashing during men's sitting downhill competition.
lead_paragraph: Tyler Walker of Aspen, Colo., tumbled several times and lay motionless before members of the medical staff rushed to his side.

headline.main: U.S. Paralympic Skier Is Stable After Crash
headline.print_headline: U.S. Paralympic Skier Is Stable After Crash
